name: The Purge
description: A Discord bot that automatically purges media messages — attachments, GIFs, stickers, and emojis — from selected channels on a timed schedule.
author: Code Copilot

highlights: Configurable purge intervals (seconds, minutes, hours, days)
Selectable media types (attachments, GIFs, stickers, emojis, all)
SQL persistence for saved purge settings
Automatic resume of purge tasks after restart
next: Add purge logging and error reporting
